hole_2.error_message:
Lean error:
tactic 'rfl' failed, the left-hand side
  MvPolynomial.X 0 * MvPolynomial.X 1 * 2 + MvPolynomial.X 0 ^ 2 * 2 + MvPolynomial.X 1 ^ 2 * 2
is not definitionally equal to the right-hand side
  MvPolynomial.X 0 * MvPolynomial.X 1 *
        (MvPolynomial.bind₁
            ![MvPolynomial.X 0 * MvPolynomial.X 1 ^ 2 + MvPolynomial.X 0 ^ 2 * MvPolynomial.X 1,
              MvPolynomial.X 0 * MvPolynomial.X 1 + MvPolynomial.X 0 ^ 2 + MvPolynomial.X 1 ^ 2])
          2 +
      MvPolynomial.X 0 ^ 2 *
        (MvPolynomial.bind₁
            ![MvPolynomial.X 0 * MvPolynomial.X 1 ^ 2 + MvPolynomial.X 0 ^ 2 * MvPolynomial.X 1,
              MvPolynomial.X 0 * MvPolynomial.X 1 + MvPolynomial.X 0 ^ 2 + MvPolynomial.X 1 ^ 2])
          2 +
    MvPolynomial.X 1 ^ 2 *
      (MvPolynomial.bind₁
          ![MvPolynomial.X 0 * MvPolynomial.X 1 ^ 2 + MvPolynomial.X 0 ^ 2 * MvPolynomial.X 1,
            MvPolynomial.X 0 * MvPolynomial.X 1 + MvPolynomial.X 0 ^ 2 + MvPolynomial.X 1 ^ 2])
        2
case h
P Q : MvPolynomial (Fin 2) ℤ
hP : P = MvPolynomial.X 0 ^ 2 * MvPolynomial.X 1 + MvPolynomial.X 0 * MvPolynomial.X 1 ^ 2
hQ : Q = MvPolynomial.X 0 ^ 2 + MvPolynomial.X 0 * MvPolynomial.X 1 + MvPolynomial.X 1 ^ 2
F G : ℕ → MvPolynomial (Fin 2) ℤ
hF : ∀ (n : ℕ), F n = (MvPolynomial.X 0 + MvPolynomial.X 1) ^ n - MvPolynomial.X 0 ^ n - MvPolynomial.X 1 ^ n
hG : ∀ (n : ℕ), G n = (MvPolynomial.X 0 + MvPolynomial.X 1) ^ n + MvPolynomial.X 0 ^ n + MvPolynomial.X 1 ^ n
hn : 0 < 2
h h₁ : 2 % 2 = 0
h₂ : 0 < 2
hn₂ : 2 ≥ 2
⊢ MvPolynomial.X 0 * MvPolynomial.X 1 * 2 + MvPolynomial.X 0 ^ 2 * 2 + MvPolynomial.X 1 ^ 2 * 2 =
    MvPolynomial.X 0 * MvPolynomial.X 1 *
          (MvPolynomial.bind₁
              ![MvPolynomial.X 0 * MvPolynomial.X 1 ^ 2 + MvPolynomial.X 0 ^ 2 * MvPolynomial.X 1,
                MvPolynomial.X 0 * MvPolynomial.X 1 + MvPolynomial.X 0 ^ 2 + MvPolynomial.X 1 ^ 2])
            2 +
        MvPolynomial.X 0 ^ 2 *
          (MvPolynomial.bind₁
              ![MvPolynomial.X 0 * MvPolynomial.X 1 ^ 2 + MvPolynomial.X 0 ^ 2 * MvPolynomial.X 1,
                MvPolynomial.X 0 * MvPolynomial.X 1 + MvPolynomial.X 0 ^ 2 + MvPolynomial.X 1 ^ 2])
            2 +
      MvPolynomial.X 1 ^ 2 *
        (MvPolynomial.bind₁
            ![MvPolynomial.X 0 * MvPolynomial.X 1 ^ 2 + MvPolynomial.X 0 ^ 2 * MvPolynomial.X 1,
              MvPolynomial.X 0 * MvPolynomial.X 1 + MvPolynomial.X 0 ^ 2 + MvPolynomial.X 1 ^ 2])
          2
hole_2.original_tactic:
rcases h₄ with (rfl | rfl | rfl)
use 2 * X 1
simp [hG, hP, hQ, aeval_def, eval₂_add, eval₂_mul, eval₂_pow, eval₂_X]
ring_nf
norm_num
rfl
use 2 * X 1 ^ 2
simp [hG, hP, hQ, aeval_def, eval₂_add, eval₂_mul, eval₂_pow, eval₂_X]
ring_nf
norm_num
rfl
use 2 * X 1 ^ 3 + 3 * X 0 ^ 2
simp [hG, hP, hQ, aeval_def, eval₂_add, eval₂_mul, eval₂_pow, eval₂_X]
ring_nf
norm_num
rfl

hole_6.original_tactic:
rw [h₄] at *
simp [hF, hP, hQ, aeval_def, eval₂_add, eval₂_mul, eval₂_pow, eval₂_X, eval₂_zero]
